mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_address (user_id, receiver_name, receiver_phone, detail_address, is_default, deleted) VALUES (#{userId}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{detailAddress}, #{isDefault}, #{deleted})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_address SET receiver_name = #{receiverName}, receiver_phone = #{receiverPhone}, detail_address = #{detailAddress}, is_default = #{isDefault}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId} AND deleted = 0
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, receiver_name, receiver_phone, detail_address, is_default, deleted, created_at, updated_at FROM user_address WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId} AND deleted = 0 LIMIT 1

SELECT id, user_id, receiver_name, receiver_phone, detail_address, is_default, deleted, created_at, updated_at FROM user_address WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY is_default DESC, updated_at DESC
SELECT id, user_id, receiver_name, receiver_phone, detail_address, is_default, deleted, created_at, updated_at FROM user_address WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND deleted = 0 AND is_default = 1 LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE user_address SET is_default = 0, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND deleted = 0 AND is_default = 1
